subject: Update on your application for {{job_title}} at {{company_name}}
template:
Dear {{candidate_name}},

Thank you for your interest in the {{job_title}} position at {{company_name}} and for taking the time to submit your application.

After careful consideration of all candidates, we regret to inform you that we have decided not to proceed with your application at this time. While your profile shows strong skills in many areas, we have selected candidates whose experience more closely aligns with the specific requirements of this position.

We appreciate your interest in working with {{company_name}} and encourage you to apply for future positions that match your skills and experience. We will keep your profile in our database for future opportunities that might be a better fit.

Thank you again for your interest in {{company_name}}. We wish you the best in your job search and future career endeavors.

Best regards,
{{consultant_name}}
Recruitment Consultant
RecrutementPlus

subject: Promising Candidate for your {{job_title}} Position
Interview Confirmation: {{job_title}} at {{company_name}} - {{interview_date}}
Job Offer: {{job_title}} at {{company_name}}
New Job Match: {{job_title}} at {{company_name}}
Feedback Request: Your Recent Interview with {{company_name}}
template:
Dear {{candidate_name}},

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up regarding your recent interview for the {{job_title}} position at {{company_name}} which took place on {{interview_date}}.

We'd appreciate your feedback on the interview process to help us improve our services. Could you please share:

1. How would you rate the overall interview experience (on a scale of 1-5)?
2. Was the job description aligned with what was discussed during the interview?
3. Did you feel adequately prepared for the interview based on the information we provided?
4. Is there any additional information or support you would have liked from our team?

Also, please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the position or next steps in the process. We're expecting feedback from {{company_name}} soon and will update you as soon as we hear from them.

Thank you for your time and cooperation.

Best regards,
{{consultant_name}}
Recruitment Consultant
RecrutementPlus
Phone: {{consultant_phone}}
